title: Gold Steadies as Focus Turns to Fed Rate Plans in Thin Trading
description: Gold steadied, after jumping 2% on Wednesday, with some Asian markets closed for Lunar New Year holidays and traders focused on the Federal Reserve’s next move on interest rates.
content: Gold steadied, after jumping 2% on Wednesday, with some Asian markets closed for Lunar New Year holidays and traders focused on the Federal Reserve’s next move on interest rates.
